alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:14AM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTRY PRECIPITATION CONTINUING ACROSS THE AREA... .Occasional light snow was impacting northern Wisconsin early this morning, while a light wintry mix was observed along and south of a line from Wisconsin Rapids to Sturgeon Bay. The precipitation is expected to increase again during the late morning and afternoon, with mixed precipitation changing to snow in the southern and eastern parts of the forecast area during the afternoon. The snow will taper off from south to north during the late afternoon and evening. Reduced visibilities and snow or ice covered roads will result in hazardous travel conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times during the late morning and afternoon. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...After a lull early this morning, snow will increase in coverage and intensity late this morning and afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Wisconsin can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
